"Patty": "Alright, we've made it to Wopal! Wow, that's a dazzling sea! Let's start our intel gathering, Tia!"
"Tch, you're not Tia! That's right, Tia stayed back! Sorry, it's just such a habit."
"Tia is relaxing today, so I plan to run the intel gathering for her! Don't tell Tia though!"
"She's always working so hard. I've got to let her rest sometimes! Look! I'm such a dignified sister!"
"Anyway, this is your turn as the hidden third character in Patty and Tia! We can't ask anyone else to do this!"
"Come on, let's go! I'm looking forward to doing this mission with you while we're in this situation!"
